mapper.select: SELECT l.lecture_no, s.* FROM Lecture l LEFT JOIN Student_lecture sl ON l.lecture_no = sl.lecture_no LEFT JOIN Student s ON sl.student_no = s.student_no WHERE lecture_no = #{lecture_no}
SELECT l.*, t.ta_no FROM Lecture l LEFT JOIN Ta t ON l.ta_no = t.ta_no
mapper.update: UPDATE Lecture SET lecture_name = #{lecture_name}, lecture_type = #{lecture_type}, ta_no = #{ta_no}, WHERE lecture_no = #{lecture_no}
mapper.select: SELECT l.*, p.name FROM lecture l JOIN professor_lecture pl ON l.lecture_no = pl.lecture_no AND l.lecture_no = #{lecture_no} JOIN professor p ON on pl.professor_no = p.professor_no

SELECT l.*, p.name FROM lecture l JOIN professor_lecture pl ON l.lecture_no = pl.lecture_no and l.lecture_name not in (select lecture_name from lecture l join student_lecture sl on l.lecture_no = sl.lecture_no join student s on sl.student_no = s.student_no and s.student_no=#{student_no} ) JOIN professor p ON pl.professor_no = p.professor_no ORDER BY l.lecture_no LIMIT #{start}, #{pagination.sz}

SELECT l.*, p.name FROM lecture l JOIN professor_lecture pl ON l.lecture_no = pl.lecture_no and l.lecture_name not in (select lecture_name from lecture l join student_lecture sl on l.lecture_no = sl.lecture_no join student s on sl.student_no = s.student_no and s.student_no=#{student_no} ) JOIN professor p ON pl.professor_no = p.professor_no WHERE l.lecture_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') ORDER BY l.lecture_no LIMIT #{start}, #{pagination.sz}

SELECT count(*) FROM lecture l JOIN professor_lecture pl ON l.lecture_no = pl.lecture_no and l.lecture_name not in (select lecture_name from lecture l join student_lecture sl on l.lecture_no = sl.lecture_no join student s on sl.student_no = s.student_no and s.student_no=40 ) JOIN professor p ON pl.professor_no = p.professor_no WHERE l.lecture_name LIKE CONCAT('%','데이터','%')

SELECT count(*) FROM lecture l JOIN professor_lecture pl ON l.lecture_no = pl.lecture_no and l.lecture_name not in (select lecture_name from lecture l join student_lecture sl on l.lecture_no = sl.lecture_no join student s on sl.student_no = s.student_no and s.student_no=#{studnet_no} ) JOIN professor p ON pl.professor_no = p.professor_no ;
